IUE.name: OpenEdge ODBC ABL Sample
IUE.shortDescription: This sample provides ABL code for querying Cloud data sources available via the DataDirect Cloud Server
IUE.description:
DataDirect Cloud (www.datadirectcloud.com) provides standardised access to a number of cloud data providers like Salesforce.com, Microsoft Dynamics and others. This sample provides a simple ABL API for querying those data sources; the results of the query are returned as either a temp-table or as JSON text.
README.md in the root folder in the new project contains instructions for setting up and running this sample.
